description.original: Enhance Obsidian's desktop edit mode with features such as WYSIWYG / Live Preview, Syntax Highlighting, and more.
description.translation: Enhance Obsidian's desktop edit mode with features such as WYSIWYG / Live Preview, Syntax Highlighting, and more.

dict..log(\"found inline marker in registry\": .log("found inline marker in registry", markers, marker)
dict..log(\"unable to find inline wiget in fo: .log("unable to find inline wiget in fold registry", markers, marker)
dict.text: \"⚠️ Notice: Most of this plugin d: text: "⚠️ Notice: Most of this plugin does not function when Live Preview mode is enabled."
dict..setName(\"Use CodeMirror for syntax hig: .setName("Use CodeMirror for syntax highlighting in preview mode")
dict..setName(\"⚠️ Show line numbers for code: .setName("⚠️ Show line numbers for code blocks in preview mode")
dict..setName(\"Enable copy button to code bl: .setName("Enable copy button to code blocks in preview mode")
dict..setName(\"⚠️ Enable copy button to all: .setName("⚠️ Enable copy button to all PRE blocks in preview mode")
dict..setDesc(`Emulate WYSIWYG while editing:
.setDesc(`Emulate WYSIWYG while editing by hiding markdown tokens. Markdown tokens will automatically hide once the cursor leaves the element.
         This mode will apply the class .hmd-inactive-line to all inactive lines and the class .hmd-hidden-token to all hidden tokens.`)
dict..setDesc(`These markdown token types wil:
.setDesc(`These markdown token types will be hidden. The default value will hide all currently supported tokens.
         Values must be pipe delimted with no spaces. Available options are: em|strong|strikethrough|code|linkText|task|internalLink|highlight`)
dict..setDesc(`Completely replace the HyperMD:
.setDesc(`Completely replace the HyperMD CodeMirror mode with a modified version of HyperMD that aims to
                replicate the default Obsidian edit mode parser while adding additional functionality such as
                improved internal link parsing.`)
dict..setDesc(`This will collapse external li:
.setDesc(`This will collapse external links in edit mode so that the URL is hidden and only the link text is shown. 
                The full URL will display once you click into the link text.`)
dict..setDesc(`This will render images in edi: .setDesc(`This will render images in edit mode inline. Clicking on the image will collapse the image down to its source view.`)
dict..setDesc(`Allow mouse clicks to toggle c: .setDesc(`Allow mouse clicks to toggle checkboxes in edit mode.`)
dict..setDesc(`Disable this if you want to do: .setDesc(`Disable this if you want to do your own styling of edit mode checkboxes. This setting does nothing if Hide Markdown Tokens is disabled`)
dict..setDesc(`If this is disabled, none of t: .setDesc(`If this is disabled, none of the options below will do anything`)
dict..setDesc(`Append a backlinks component t: .setDesc(`Append a backlinks component to the footer of edit mode documents`)
dict..setDesc(`Apply data attributes to the C:
.setDesc(`Apply data attributes to the CodeMirror line div elements that describe the contained child elements. Think of
      this like Contextual Typography for Edit Mode.`)
dict..setDesc(`A comma seperated list of fron: .setDesc(`A comma seperated list of front matter keys to turn into CSS variables and data attributes. This setting requires that the Container Attributes setting is enabled.`)
dict..setDesc(`Automatically align markdown t: .setDesc(`Automatically align markdown tables as they are being built. Note: This setting currently requires that OpenMD Mode be enabled.`)
dict..setDesc(`When enabled, the cursor heigh:
.setDesc(`When enabled, the cursor height will be determined by the max height of the entire line. 
         When disabled, the cursor's height is based on the height of the adjacent reference character.`)
dict..setDesc(`When enabled, selected text wi:
.setDesc(`When enabled, selected text will be marked with the CSS class .CodeMirror-selectedtext. 
         Useful to force the styling of selected text when ::selection is not sufficient.`)
dict..setDesc(`When enabled, text selection w:
.setDesc(`When enabled, text selection will not remove the .active-line class on the current line. 
         When disabled text selection on the active line will remove the .active-line class.`)
dict..setDesc(`Value is in milliseconds. Defa: .setDesc(`Value is in milliseconds. Default is 530. Set to 0 to disable blinking.`)
dict..setDesc(`Apply syntax highlighting them:
.setDesc(`Apply syntax highlighting themes to code blocks in edit mode. The default theme is Material Pale Night
                but additional themes are available via the Style Settings plugin`)

.setDesc(`Apply syntax highlighting themes to code blocks in preview mode. The default theme is Material Pale Night
        but additional themes are available via the Style Settings plugin`)
dict..setDesc(`This setting creates consisten: .setDesc(`This setting creates consistent highlighting between edit and preview by using CodeMirror to highlight code in both modes.`)
dict..setDesc(`This setting will add line num: .setDesc(`This setting will add line numbers to code blocks in preview mode.`)
dict..setDesc(`This setting will add a copy b: .setDesc(`This setting will add a copy button to the bottom left corner of code blocks in preview mode. The button will show up on code block hover.`)
.setDesc(`This setting will add a copy button to any PRE element. This could negatively impact certain plugins that render PRE blocks.`)
dict..setDesc(`To customize the syntax highli:
.setDesc(`To customize the syntax highlighting theme, 
    install the Style Settings plugin and expand the "CodeMirror Options" section`)
dict..innerText = \"Error: Unable to find the: .innerText = "Error: Unable to find the Admonitions plugin or Admonition version not 6.3.6 or higher"
.innerText = "Error: Unable to find the Obsidian Charts plugin"
.innerText = "Error: Unable to find the Global Search plugin"
.innerText = "Error: Unable to find the Dataview plugin or version not 0.4.17 or greater"
.innerText = "Error: Unable to find the Tasks plugin or version not 1.4.0 or greater"
